sentence.text: Purpose To compare digital mammography (DM) plus digital breast tomosynthesis (biological_process) versus DM alone for breast cancer screening in the Reggio Emilia Tomosynthesis trial, a two-arm test-and-treat randomized controlled trial.
PPV of the recall was 13.0% and 24.1%, respectively (P = .0002); 72 of 80 cancers found in the biological_process+DM arm and with complete DBT imaging were positive at least at one DBT-alone reading.

The greater detection rate for DM+biological_process was stronger for ductal carcinoma in situ (+180%, 95% CI: 1, 665); it was notable for small and medium invasive cancers, but not for large ones (+94 [95% CI: 6, 254]; +122 [95% CI: 18, 316]; -12 [95% CI: -68, 141]; for invasive cancers AAAA 10 mm, 10-19 mm, and G 20 mm, respectively).
